mapper.insert: insert into shopInfo(shopNum, memberId, shopName, shopPhone, shopAddr, shopOpen, shopClose,shopOff, shopPhoto, shopIntro, shopParking, shopPolicy) values (shopInfo_seq.nextval,#{memberId},#{shopName},#{shopPhone},#{shopAddr},#{shopOpen},#{shopClose},#{shopOff},#{shopPhoto},#{shopIntro},#{shopParking},#{shopPolicy})
mapper.delete: delete from shopInfo where shopNum=#{shopNum} and memberId=#{memberId}
